automaton

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • automaton.State

  • public class State
extends java.lang.Object
    State class, allowing you to create State and link them with transitions using characters States are used to create Automaton
    See Also:
    AutomatonBuilder

      • containsTransition

        Test if the transition given is a transition of the current State
        Parameters:

        Returns:
